original_text: And many spread their cloaks on the road, and others spread leafy branches that they had cut from the fields.
korean_text: 많은 사람들은 자기들의 겉옷을, 또 다른 이들은 들에서 벤 나뭇가지를 길에 펴며

sentences.original_text: And many spread their cloaks on the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 사람들이 자기들의 겉옷을 길에 펐고

sentences.original_text: that they had cut from the fields
